summary: This mod adds new recipes so that you can finally CREATE flawless gems from regular gems.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Georgia][color=#00ff00][size=6][b][i]Flawless Crafting[/i][/b][/size][/color][/font][/center]

This mod adds an easy and realistic way to create Flawless gems! One of the biggest problems I have had when creating jewelry was those pesky flawless gems, so now, you can easily create them yourself as it should have been!

[color=#ff0000][size=4][i][b]How to [/b][/i][/size][/color] 
-Find nearest Grindstone
-Acquire normal gems (damn normies) 
-Sit down and start grinding! easy as that!

[color=#ff0000][size=4][b][i]Install
[/i][/b][/size][/color]-Drag and drop esp into Skyrim data folder
-Use Nexsus mod manager

[b][i][color=#ff0000][size=4]Load Order
[/size][/color][/i][/b]-I suggest putting above any jewelry mods that alter recipes
author: JakeOberg
